means: 易动气地，过分敏感地，小心眼地

sentence.Network_en: Formal, exact and obstinate, he was also cold, suspicious, touchy and tactless.
sentence.Network_cn: 严肃、严谨、倔强的他同时又冷漠、多疑、敏感、不会变通。

sentence.Network_en: She is very touchy about her past.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对自己的过去非常敏感。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... toss 扔，掷；摇摆 touchy 暴躁的；易怒的 tourism 旅游事业.
雅思词汇词根+联想记忆法 ... torrent n. 激流,洪流,湍流 touchy a. 易怒的,暴躁的,敏感的 tourism n. 旅游事业.
《Friends》词汇表B ... oath n. 誓言, 宣誓, 诅咒 touchy adj. 暴躁的, 难以处理的, 易起火的 injure vt. 损害, 伤害v.伤害.
touchwood 火绒touchy 过敏的tough 恶棍

list.abs: child molestation is a touchy subject … Read the papers ! half the country's doing it !凌虐小孩是一个敏感的话题。看看报纸！全国有一半的人都在这样做。
sex is a particularly touchy subject at work , where even a hint of sexual harassment can bring on a dam-aging lawsuit .工作时，性是一个非常敏感的问题，哪怕是性骚扰的一点暗示也会带来一场严重的官司。
...I am a touched person. 我是一个容易感动的人。touchy topic 敏感话题trace back to Tang Dynasty 追溯到唐朝
But the Americans were very touchy the Pacific ., 但是美国人对太平洋问题是很敏感的.
a long - term crutch for politically touchy commodities ., 政治敏感的大宗商品的长期支撑.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: perhaps an alteration of tetchy, influenced by touch

entry.tran: 易怒的;过于敏感的;暴躁的
entry.def: If you describe someone as touchy, you mean that they are easily upset, offended, or irritated.

example.ex: She is very touchy about her past...
example.tran: 她对自己的过去非常敏感。

entry.tran: 棘手的;难办的;需谨慎处理的
entry.def: If you say that something is a touchy subject, you mean that it is a subject that needs to be dealt with carefully and in a sensitive way, because it might upset or offend people.

example.tran: 政治改革这一棘手问题

auth_sentence.content: Teaching the Bible is of course a touchy subject.
auth_sentence.res_content: Teaching the Bible is of course a touchy subject.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Teaching the Bible is of course a touchy subject.

auth_sentence.content: Barbecue is a touchy subject all over the country.
auth_sentence.res_content: Barbecue is a touchy subject all over the country.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Barbecue is a touchy subject all over the country.

auth_sentence.content: Politics and rock - always a touchy subject.
auth_sentence.res_content: Politics and rock - always a touchy subject.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Politics and rock - always a touchy subject.

means.word_mean: 易动气的,过分敏感的;小心眼的

sentences.en: Be careful what you say because he’s touchy.
sentences.cn: 你说话小心,因为他容易生气。

sentences.en: They are touchy on the subject of religion and you have to pick your words carefully when talking about it.
sentences.cn: 他们对宗教问题很敏感,因此涉及这个问题时你说话要小心。
